attributes.action: STOP FURTHER DROWNING IN FLOODS NOW. CUT CAR USE TO REDUCE C02 & STOP BUILDING CONCRETE SPRAWL.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THE UK IS AN ISLAND. WE NEED TO URGE ARE LEADERS TO STOP THIS NOW. BEFORE WE HOLD THEM TO ACCOUNT. How many will die from drowning in these floods here in the UK. Governments past and present, have been slow with environment policy changes. Instead they have put the economy first and have allowed us to severely over use our cars which polute the environment with CO2. The Government has also continued to allow more and more house building take place in the wrong areas. Now it wants to build even more new homes? IT REALY MUST STOP. OTHERWISE NONE OF US WILL BE LEFT LIVING
